title: Happy Stewfday Bird!
content:

author: peterbruhn

Happy birthday, Stewf -- can't wait to meet you, and so glad you're moving to the neighborhood!

Stewf --   
   
A much belated Happy Birthday!   
   
So sorry I missed it this year. I haven't been around much due to a new job and massive responsibilities. More to tell when we hook up at TypeCon. I'm glad you'll be in SF.   
   
I'm off to the airport in a few hours. See you tomorrow.   
   
-- Kent.

So I'm a little late.   
   
Happy BDay buddy!
